remarks: If two structures have the same components (properties), they have the same subspace structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lsmpropd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
lsmpropd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
lsmpropd.p $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
lsmpropd.v1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. _V ) $.
lsmpropd.v2 $e |- ( ph -> L e. _V ) $.
lsmpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( LSSum ` K ) = ( LSSum ` L ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
